name: api_ui_GUI
description: The GUI class is the interface for Unity's GUI with manual positioning.

properties.name: BeginGroup
properties.description: Begin a group. Must be matched with a call to EndGroup.

properties.name: BeginScrollView
properties.description: Begin a scrolling view inside your GUI.

properties.name: Box
properties.description: Create a Box on the GUI Layer.

properties.name: BringWindowToBack
properties.description: Bring a specific window to back of the floating windows.

properties.name: BringWindowToFront
properties.description: Bring a specific window to front of the floating windows.

properties.name: Button
properties.description: Make a single press button. The user clicks them and something happens immediately.

properties.name: DragWindow
properties.description: Make a window draggable.

properties.name: DrawTexture
properties.description: Draw a texture within a rectangle.

properties.name: DrawTextureWithTexCoords
properties.description: Draw a texture within a rectangle with the given texture coordinates.

properties.name: EndGroup
properties.description: End a group.

properties.name: EndScrollView
properties.description: Ends a scrollview started with a call to BeginScrollView.

properties.name: FocusControl
properties.description: Move keyboard focus to a named control.

properties.name: FocusWindow
properties.description: Make a window become the active window.

properties.name: GetNameOfFocusedControl
properties.description: Get the name of named control that has focus.

properties.name: HorizontalScrollbar
properties.description: Make a horizontal scrollbar. Scrollbars are what you use to scroll through a document. Most likely, you want to use scrollViews instead.

properties.name: HorizontalSlider
properties.description: A horizontal slider the user can drag to change a value between a min and a max.

properties.name: Label
properties.description: Make a text or texture label on screen.

properties.name: ModalWindow
properties.description: Show a Modal Window.

properties.name: PasswordField
properties.description: Make a text field where the user can enter a password.

properties.name: RepeatButton
properties.description: Make a button that is active as long as the user holds it down.
